name: Santa Clara County Housing Authority
description: Section 8 housing vouchers for Santa Clara County residents
fullDescription: The Santa Clara County Housing Authority administers the largest Section 8 program in California, serving low-income families throughout Santa Clara County.
whatTheyOffer:
- Section 8 Housing Choice Vouchers (17,000+ vouchers)
- Project-based vouchers
- VASH vouchers for homeless veterans
- Family self-sufficiency program
- Rapid rehousing programs
- Homeless prevention services
howToGetIt:
1. Check SCCHA website for waitlist status
2. Apply when waitlist opens (check website regularly)
3. Must meet income limits (50% area median income)
4. Santa Clara County residents get preference
5. Wait for name on waitlist (can be years)
address: 505 W. Julian Street, San Jose, CA 95110
keywords: SCCHA, Santa Clara Housing Authority, Section 8, housing voucher, San Jose, Silicon Valley, low-income, waitlist
